mapper.insert: insert into exchange_account (id, coin, cum_income, balance, locked, cum_withdraw, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cumIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cumWithdraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update exchange_account set coin = #{coin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cum_income = #{cumIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cum_withdraw = #{cumWithdraw,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, coin, cum_income, balance, locked, cum_withdraw, create_time, update_time from exchange_account
